models.name: todo_list_guest
models.description: Guest entities representing unauthenticated users with minimal permissions. Guests do not require authentication fields like email or password. This table supports managing guests as distinct actors with limited access. It tracks creation, update, and deletion timestamps for audit purposes.

plainFields.name: created_at
plainFields.description: Timestamp when the guest record was created.

plainFields.name: updated_at
plainFields.description: Timestamp when the guest record was last updated.

plainFields.name: deleted_at
plainFields.description: Timestamp when the guest record was deleted (soft delete).

models.name: todo_list_user
models.description: Authenticated user entities with login credentials and permissions to manage their todos. Includes email and hashed password for authentication. Enforces unique email. Tracks creation, update, and deletion timestamps. Supports soft deletes.

plainFields.name: email
plainFields.description: User email address used for authentication and contact. Must be unique across users.

plainFields.name: password_hash
plainFields.description: Hashed password for user authentication. Passwords must not be stored in plain text.

plainFields.name: created_at
plainFields.description: Timestamp when the user was created.

plainFields.name: updated_at
plainFields.description: Timestamp when the user was last updated.

plainFields.name: deleted_at
plainFields.description: Timestamp when the user was deleted (soft delete).

models.name: todo_list_admin
models.description: Administrator users with elevated permissions and full system access. Includes email and hashed password for authentication. Enforces unique email addresses. Tracks creation, update, and deletion timestamps for audit and soft delete purposes.

plainFields.name: email
plainFields.description: Admin email address used for authentication and contact. Must be unique across admins.

plainFields.name: password_hash
plainFields.description: Hashed password for admin authentication. Passwords must never be stored in plain text.

plainFields.name: created_at
plainFields.description: Timestamp when the admin user was created.

plainFields.name: updated_at
plainFields.description: Timestamp when the admin user was last updated.

plainFields.name: deleted_at
plainFields.description: Timestamp when the admin user was deleted (soft delete).

models.name: todo_list_todos
models.description: Represents todo items owned by users. Each todo has a unique title per user, supports statuses (pending, in-progress, completed), and stores optional descriptions. Enables independent CRUD and filtering operations by users. Maintains audit trail fields for creation, update, and optional soft deletion. Foreign key to todo_list_user ensures ownership linkage. Implements unique constraint on user and title for title uniqueness per user.

plainFields.name: title
plainFields.description: Title of the todo item; unique per user; max length 100.

plainFields.name: description
plainFields.description: Optional detailed description of the todo item; max length 500.

plainFields.name: status
plainFields.description: Status of the todo item; possible values: 'pending', 'in-progress', 'completed'.

plainFields.name: created_at
plainFields.description: Timestamp when the todo item was created.

plainFields.name: updated_at
plainFields.description: Timestamp when the todo item was last updated.

plainFields.name: deleted_at
plainFields.description: Soft delete timestamp; null means active.
